message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $11500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth more than what you perceive its value to be, at a price slightly below its market value. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
